QuestData.Title: A Once Sweet Sound
QuestData.Description:
The bells! That sound!
Their song has been twisted! If their dire toll continues, we will all succumb.
<Eridia presses her hammer into your hands.>
Find the great vespers within the temple and strike them with my hammer. May the mallet's tonal purity restore their true voices!
I will listen for their clarion call and meet you near the bridge. Go swiftly!
QuestData.LogDescription: Cleanse the Vesper of Purity and the Vesper of Harmony.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Meet Eridia deeper within the Temple of Purity.
QuestData.RewardText: I can hear their song once more. It is a boon on my mind, but the loudest voice remains. We must silence it before it destroys all that we hold dear.
